Drag coefficient, :math:`\beta`: :math:`\beta = \frac{\pi d_p^2}{8} \rho_f  \left | \bf{u} - \bf{v} \right | \left( 0.63 + \frac{4.8}{\sqrt{Re_p}} \right)^2 G`, where :math:`G = \varepsilon_f ^ {-\left[ 3.7 - 0.65 exp \left( - \frac{\left( 1.5 - log_{10} Re_{p} \right)^2}{2} \right) \right]}`

:math:`\beta = \frac{\pi d_p^2}{8} \rho_f  \left | \bf{u} - \bf{v} \right | \left( 0.63 + \frac{4.8}{\sqrt{Re_p}} \right)^2 G`, where :math:`G = \varepsilon_f ^ {-\left[ 2.65 \left( \varepsilon_f + 1 \right) - \left( 5.3 - 3.5 \varepsilon_f \right) \varepsilon_f^2 exp \left( - \frac{\left( 1.5 - log_{10} Re_{p} \right)^2}{2} \right) \right]}`
